title: Public Testimony Flow
author: CivHub
summary: A structured process for collecting, managing, and surfacing public input on pending legislation in an accessible and transparent format.
use_cases: Public comment periods for regulatory changes

steps.label: Bill Publication
steps.description: Draft legislation is published with a clear summary and plain-language explanation.

steps.label: Public Testimony Window
steps.description: Citizens are invited to submit testimony (written, video, audio) through a digital or in-person interface.

steps.label: Curation and Tagging
steps.description: Testimony is reviewed and tagged by moderators or civic tech tools (e.g., natural language clustering).

steps.label: Delivery to Legislators
steps.description: Summarized and tagged testimony is sent to relevant legislators or committees in a structured format.

references.label: MAPLE: MA Platform for Legislative Engagement
